subject: Junit logger
msgSnippet: Hi All, I hope someone can help me...  ;-p I need to log more info into the Junit4 report, so I would like to know how to do it at run time. There is any way
messageBody:
Hi All,

I hope someone can help me... ;-p

I need to log more info into the Junit4 report, so I would like to know how to do it at run time.

There is any way to attach the junit listener and inject additional info?


Cheers!
